did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.repository: Special Collections, University of Virginia Library
did.unittitle:
Papers of the President of the University of Virginia, Office Administrative Files
1999-2000
did.physdesc: This collection consists of ca. 25,000 items.

accessrestrict.head: Access Restrictions
accessrestrict.p: Access restrictions may apply to specific student records under the terms of the Family Educational Rights and Privacy Act (F.E.R.P.A.).

userestrict.head: Use Restrictions
userestrict.p:
See the
University of Virginia Library’s use policy.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Papers of the President of the University of Virginia, Office Administrative Files, Accession #RG-2/1/2.021, Special Collections, University of Virginia Library, Charlottesville, Va.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: This collection was transferred to the library in 2002 August.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Information
scopecontent.p: These files constitute the major record series generated by John Thomas Casteeen, the president of the University of Virginia. The records consist chiefly of correspondence, but also include reports, minutes, clippings, memoranda, and related papers concerning all areas of business of the president's office.
The papers consist of: general files, 1999-2000; seldom used permanent files, 1990-1998); and, committee files, 1999-2000.

arrangement.head: Organization
arrangement.p:
SERIES I: General Files, 1999-2000 Boxes 1-55
SERIES II: Seldom Used Permanent Files, 1990-1998 Boxes 56-65
SERIES III Committee Files, 1999-2000 Box 66
SERIES IV: Restricted Files Boxes 67-70
